Name: Mind Maze
About the game: MIND MAZE - is a logical competitive game based on capturing of the playing field. Put a walls, build a labyrinth, capture cells of playing field. Do not let the appearance of closed corners to avoid being captured by enemy. Calculate the moves to build a strategy, create a logical trap for opponent. Be cunning, force your opponent to make a mistake and cover the field like rapid avalanche, carrying you to victory. Play the single-player campaign or compete with players online. Win and get the championship of the leaderboard!
